title: #58 - That Episode About Healing with Anonymous
description:
A few weeks ago, Maria received a closure letter that moved her to tears. It was for a relationship in 2018, but the letter’s author wrote it so she could be able to heal and allow love into her life today.

Maria decided to invite the woman who wrote the letter onto this week’s podcast to talk about healing and moving on in life.

Enroll in the next Agape Intensive: https://agapematch.com/agape-group-coaching-intensive/ 

Follow Maria on Instagram Follow Maria on TikTok Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
